post.author: Brendan
post.content:
Summary of Responsibilities:

· Identifies specifications for programming jobs, determining requirements, analyzing information to determine outputs and clarifying and solidifying objectives.

· Determines platforms and technologies.

· Designs database layouts and data structures.

· Plots out organization of programs and needed algorithms.

· Analyzes, designs and maintains publication templates.

· Develops the dynamic functionality for web sites.

· Converts data from one form to another.

· Runs test scenarios and examines output to identify issues.

· Checks the functionality of programs.

· Codes programs.

· Creates installer programs.

· Provides technical support for internal systems.

· Performs other tasks as assigned by management.

· Knowledge of Java, CMS, Web Programming, SQL and Object Oriented design and methodology

Contact:
Natalie Gawel - natalie@recruitsmart.ca
post.title: Java dev - Jr to Int.
